sections: If you're a Jeep enthusiast in search of a pristine classic, then Vinhammer has a treat for you. They are currently offering a remarkable Jeep CJ7 with an astonishingly low mileage of approximately 12,700 miles since new. This exceptional vehicle is a true gem and has been meticulously maintained and restored to its former glory.

In 2013, the Jeep received a professional exterior cosmetic restoration by Collins Bros. Jeep, a renowned expert in the field, located in Wylie, Texas. The results are simply breathtaking, showcasing the Jeep CJ7's timeless design in all its glory. Additionally, Collins Bros. Jeep performed a major professional service on the vehicle, ensuring that it runs flawlessly and is ready to hit the road.

One standout feature of this Jeep CJ7 is the Howell Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) kit that was professionally installed. This upgrade not only improves the performance and efficiency of the vehicle but also enhances its reliability, making it easier to start and maintain in various driving conditions.

Equipped with the factory Renegade package, this CJ7 boasts several original features, including OEM decals, rocker panel trim, a Renegade steering wheel and horn button, a dash instrument overlay, a center console, and even the factory clock and tachometer. The attention to detail is truly commendable, preserving the authenticity and charm of this iconic Jeep model.

Inside the cabin, you'll find black denim high-back bucket seats and OEM black carpet, both of which are in impeccable, like-new condition. The interior reflects the overall care and minimal use this CJ7 has experienced throughout its life.

Under the hood, the original 258 6-cylinder motor powers this CJ7, offering reliable and robust performance. The engine is mated to a Tremec T5 5-speed manual shift transmission, which ensures a smooth and engaging driving experience. Adding to its off-road capabilities, the CJ7 features a Dana 300 dual-range transfer case, providing the necessary flexibility and power for tackling any terrain.

This Jeep CJ7 is truly a collector's dream, not only due to its remarkable condition and low mileage but also because it represents an important milestone in Jeep history. It is the first year of the wide-track axles and the introduction of a 6-digit odometer in the Jeep CJ lineup.
To find this incredible Jeep and many other exceptional vehicles, head over to Vinhammer.com. Don't miss the opportunity to own a piece of automotive history.
This amazing Jeep is one of many cool Jeeps you will find at
Contact them today to list your vehicle and get a $250 Gift Card.
